munit:config.name: delete-appointment-test-suite.xml
munit:config.doc:description:
As part of this test suite I would like to test below scenarios
1. Given valid patient id, Verify only one row is effected 2. Given valid patient id, Verify the correct status is updated in table 3. Given invalid patient id, Verify the response status code 4. Given invalid patient id, Verify the response payload 5. Given empty patient id, Verify the response status code 6. Given empty patient id, Verify the response payload

munit:test.name: verify-only-one-row-deleted
munit:test.doc:description: This test verifies, only one row is deleted when valid patient id is sent

munit:test.name: verify-status-in-table
munit:test.doc:description: This test verifies, the status is updated correctly when valid patient id is sent

munit:test.name: verify-response-status-code-with-invalid-patient-id
munit:test.doc:description: This test verifies, response status code when invalid patient id is sent

munit:test.name: verify-response-with-invalid-patient-id
munit:test.doc:description: This test verifies, response payload when invalid patient id is sent

munit:test.name: verify-response-status-code-with-empty-patient-id
munit:test.doc:description: This test verifies, response status code when empty patient id is sent

munit:test.name: verify-response-payload-with-empty-patient-id
munit:test.doc:description: This test verifies, response payload when empty patient id is sent
